title: Space Simulator
content:
I don't know if any people will like it, but I guess some will so I've decided to give the link.

The game is a 3D freeware space flight simulator, actually a remake of the old Star Wars arcade game, so you can guess the topic.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

Actually there are two of them and both are really worth trying and my opinion, challenging to beat, and the score system even keeps the master play it trying to beat records. They are REALLY wonderful, one of them is called the Battle of Endor, and there are hundreds of incoming TIEs[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] even interceptors. The models look really good in my opinion, even if it was designed to keep poly-count low. Because:

The only flaw is that it requires a PC faster than 1.4GHz. You can expect lower framerates on slower PCs. It works on my small 400MHz PC but it has an about 1FPS. It is flawless on my 2.5GHZ Ati Radeon9600 XP Pro PC (this one)

A worth try. Battle of Endor & Battle of Yavin

[url=http://www.bruneras.com]www.bruneras.com[/url]

------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.
